title: Colin Cowherd’s Blazin’ 5: 02/02/2019
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd’s Blazin’ 5: 02/02/2019
description:
Colin makes his final pick of what has been one of his best Blazing 5 seasons ever.  RJ Bell of pregame.com and Fox Sports Radio tells him which side of the Super Bowl the wise guys in Vegas are on and which prop bets are most intriguing for people to wager on.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
